title: Does anyone have problem running League of Windows 10?
body:
It runs like a shitdog

EDIT: Go into the Riot Games folder and run the "admin" League AS admin. Works fine

replies.body: I found that when i upgraded iphelper was reenabled, dunno if that will be the cause of your problems, but disable it cause that does mess with the client
to fix the FPS problem, reinstall nvidia graphics driver for your graphics card then restart.

Upgrading to Windows 10 straight away is a pretty dumb thing to do. Reserve and wait. I'm personally in the middle of my University Semester. There's no way in hell that I'm Upgrading to Windows 10 until all of my assignments are submitted. I have 3 programs that I can't have f*cking up because of compatibility issues with a new OS.
Getting about 3 FPS when I play, its unplayable.
there is nothing wrong with my graphics card and i think it is the client, but i uninstalled and reinstalled it and the same thing just happens ; blank screen on login page.
yes i have the same problems but when i come to the login page, it's just a blank screen. the music runs well but the login animations arent there. this only happened as i upgraded to windows 10.

Haven't tried it myself. My friend had some problems due to a graphics card driver issue. He was up to date for the latest one on windows 7 but a different one was out for Windows 10. It apparently was a pain to update so it might take some time but it could fix your problem! Check for updates on everything, even the bios.
